instances.excerpt: Hearts & Homes for Refugees is a volunteer-driven nonprofit organization founded on the belief that grassroots welcoming communities are the local solution to the global refugee crisis.

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height
instances.excerpt: We resettle refugees in local communities and inspire, educate and equip others to do the same. Together with community partners, faith, civic, student groups and U.S. Resettlement Agencies, we offer safe and inclusive communities and empower refugee neighbors to rebuild their lives with hope and...

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height
instances.excerpt: Our model of holistic resettlement improves the long-term outcomes for refugees. Together, we change the lives of refugees as well as the lives of those who offer their time and resources to resettle new neighbors.

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height
instances.excerpt: As early adopters of community-driven refugee resettlement in 2016, we are proud to be part of new government-sponsored private citizen initiatives to increase capacity to holistically welcome more refugees and build stronger communities.

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height
instances.excerpt: It’s 2023 and we are expanding and depending more than ever on volunteers and community partners to resettle and assist our new neighbors. Learn more about h ... nteering or forming a Spons... Community Sponsor Sign-Up form .

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height
instances.excerpt: Visit our Refugee Advocacy Page and reach out to us to become a voice for refugees and policies that affect our new neighbors.

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height
instances.excerpt: Donate to help us support newly arriving Afghan evacuees and other refugees in our community. Learn more about our Ways to Get Involved and become a volunteer for Hearts & Homes.

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height
instances.excerpt: We value the time-honored tradition of welcoming that is deeply rooted in shared humanitarian beliefs and the role of people of goodwill who step up to welcome refugees when given the opportunity to do so.

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height
instances.excerpt: To keep up to date with advocating and welcoming refugees here in our region and across the country, please sign up to receive Our monthly newsletters at the bottom of the page or visit our Upcoming Dates calendar.
